line.text: To me fair friend you never can be old
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For as you were when first your eye I eyed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Such seems your beauty still three winters cold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Have from the forests shook three summers pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Three beauteous springs to yellow autumn turned
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In process of the seasons have I seen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Three April perfumes in three hot Junes burned
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since first I saw you fresh which yet are green
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ah yet doth beauty like a dial hand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Steal from his figure and no pace perceived
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So your sweet hue which methinks still doth stand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hath motion and mine eye may be deceived
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For fear of which hear this thou age unbred
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ere you were born was beauty summer dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
